com.is2t.mwt.model
Class RangeHolder

java.lang.Object
  ej.microui.Model
      com.is2t.mwt.model.RangeHolder

public class RangeHolder
extends ej.microui.Model

Holds an integer value and its upper and lower limits, defining a range. Designed to be used as a model for widgets. Notifies its listeners when the value or range changes.

Field Summary
static int EVENT_MINMAX_CHANGED
          Value passed to the Listener.performAction(int) method of the listener if the minimum and maximum were changed.
static int EVENT_VALUE_CHANGED
          Value passed to the Listener.performAction(int) method of the listener if the value was changed.

setValue

public void setValue(int value)
Sets the current value.
If value is not within range it will be adjusted.
Calls the Listener.performAction(int) method of the listener with (EVENT_VALUE_CHANGED) as parameter.

Parameters:
value - the value to set

updateValue

public void updateValue(int increment)
Updates the current value with an increment.
If the resulting value is not within range it will be adjusted.
Calls the Listener.performAction(int) method of the listener with (EVENT_VALUE_CHANGED) as parameter.

Parameters:
increment - the increment to apply

setMinMaxValues

public void setMinMaxValues(int minValue,
                            int maxValue)
Sets the minimum and maximum values of the RangeData.
If value is not within range it will be adjusted.
Calls the Listener.performAction(int) method of the listener with (EVENT_MINMAX_CHANGED) as parameter.

Parameters:
minValue - the minimum value to set
maxValue - the maximum value to set
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the minimum value is bigger than the maximum value
